title: New Creator: Team Elevate
body:
[Name] 
Elevate

[Socials]
Elevate Website- https://elevate.gg/
Facebook- https://fb.com/elevategg
Twitter - https://twitter.com/elevategg
Instagram - https://instagram.com/elevate.gg
Twitch- https://twitch.tv/elevategg
Youtube - https://youtube.com/elevategg

[Info] 
Elevate was founded in 2014 by a group of competitors who wanted to create a powerhouse esports organization, who operated outside of boundaries. What started as a group of friends saving money to send teams to LAN events, turned into an international business with multiple championship teams and over $2.5 million dollars in prize winnings. Elevate has shown results with Championship rosters in games such as Call of Duty, Rainbow Six, Paladins, World of Tanks, H1Z1, and more.

Elevate’s mission is to lead and innovate in player management, relationships with sponsors and partners, and to set a standard for professionalism in one of the largest-growing industries in the world.

[Use Cases]
1) Distribution – Coins will get into the hands of the fans via special merch drops, giveaways, and when people show that they use code “Elevate” on sponsorship products.
2) Holding Mechanics – Fans will get a specific discord role where they will get offered discounts and early access to merchandise/sponsorship products. They would be the first to know of any upcoming sales/designs before it gets announced to the public. They would also be invited to community nights where they would get to interact with other members of the staff and the rest of the Elevate team. 
3) Transactions - Fans will be able to use $ELV coins to purchase limited edition merchandise, to get special shoutouts/cameos from specific content creators, to play with various content creators, invitation to custom tournaments/in-house tournaments.

[Grant]
$1000

A 'yes' will approve Elevate with a $1000 community treasury grant.
A 'no' will deny this proposal
author: 0x5ea400d06Afe7aebae54216aDfD7a4bF5f15F993
